rms.model

Class FeaturesDropDown

  • java.lang.Object
    • rms.model.FeaturesDropDown

  • public class FeaturesDropDown
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is meant to be used with the PRMS database. It is a model class for the FeatureType , Features, and Resources tables in the database tables in the database. This class uses data from multiple tables and requires the RoomDropMapper class to accomplish this. FeatureName is retrieved from FeatureType, Quantity from Features, and ResourceName from Resources.
    Author:
